actionCalls.description: Passes the NAV task to Apex for delegation.
actionCalls.name: Delegate_NAV_Task
actionCalls.label: Delegate NAV Task

actionCalls.description: Base 64 encodes the original document for archiving
actionCalls.name: Encode_Original
actionCalls.label: Encode Original

actionCalls.description: Generates a base 64 encoded pdf string
actionCalls.name: Generate_PDF
actionCalls.label: Generate PDF

actionCalls.description: Sends the journal request via Apex.
actionCalls.name: Post_Journal
actionCalls.label: Post Journal

actionCalls.description: Passes the reference sObject to the logger utility to be stored in app logs.
actionCalls.name: Store_Application_Log
actionCalls.label: Store Application Log

assignments.description: Adds information from the iterated journal entry.
assignments.name: Add_Journal_Entry
assignments.label: Add Journal Entry

assignments.description: Assigns values to the document wrapper class.
assignments.name: Create_Document_Wrapper
assignments.label: Create Document Wrapper

assignments.description: Assigns the apprrpriate values to the journal post request
assignments.name: Create_Journal_Post_Request
assignments.label: Create Journal Post Request

assignments.description: Assigns values to the original document variant.
assignments.name: Create_Original_Document_Variant
assignments.label: Create Original Document Variant

assignments.description: Assigns values to the PDF document variant.
assignments.name: Create_PDF_Document_Variant
assignments.label: Create PDF Document Variant

assignments.description: Assigns field values for the journal entry record to be created.
assignments.name: Set_Journal_Entry_Data
assignments.label: Set Journal Entry Data

decisions.description: Checks if a journal entry has already been created.
decisions.name: Check_Journal_Entry_Created
decisions.label: Check Journal Entry Created

decisions.description: Check if the chat has set the social information flag set to true.
decisions.name: Check_Social_Information
decisions.label: Check Social Information

decisions.description: Decide if a task should be created or not.
decisions.name: Should_Create_Task
decisions.label: Should Create Task?

decisions.description: Decide if a task should be created or not.
decisions.name: Should_Create_Task_0
decisions.label: Should Create Task?

Flow.description: Flow to initiate the creation of a journal entry.

formulas.description: Formula for det template document title to handle different languages.
formulas.name: Document_Title
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!Get_Chat_Transcript.LiveChatButton.WindowLanguage}, 'en_US'), 'Authenticated written conversation with NAV', 'Innlogget skriftlig samtale med NAV' )

formulas.description: Formula to generate a default task name.
formulas.name: Task_Name

Flow.label: Chat Create Journal Entry

loops.description: Loops through the journal entries to generate text output to user.
loops.name: Journal_Entry_Loop
loops.label: Journal Entry Loop

recordCreates.description: Creates task even though process fails.
recordCreates.name: Create_Placeholder_Task
recordCreates.label: Create Placeholder Task

recordCreates.description: Inserts the Salesforce NAV task after a successful callout.
recordCreates.name: Create_Salesforce_NAV_Task
recordCreates.label: Create Salesforce NAV Task

recordCreates.description: Inserts the Salesforce NAV task after a successful callout.
recordCreates.name: Create_Salesforce_NAV_Task_0
recordCreates.label: Create Salesforce NAV Task

recordCreates.description: Stores the generated journal entry data i custom object
recordCreates.name: Store_Journal_Entry
recordCreates.label: Store Journal Entry

recordCreates.description: Stores the generated journal entry data i custom object
recordCreates.name: Store_Journal_Entry_0
recordCreates.label: Store Journal Entry

recordLookups.description: Queries the account related from the transcript.
recordLookups.name: Get_Account
recordLookups.label: Get Account

recordLookups.description: Query the chat transcript triggering the flow.
recordLookups.name: Get_Chat_Transcript
recordLookups.label: Get Chat Transcript

recordLookups.description: Check to see if there are any journal entries created for this chat already
recordLookups.name: Get_Journal_Entries
recordLookups.label: Get Journal Entries

screens.description: Screen for displaying potential error messages
screens.name: Error_Screen
screens.label: Error Screen

fields.name: Error_Header
fields.fieldText: Feil ved journalføring/oppgaveopprettelse

fields.name: Missing_Account_Error
fields.fieldText: Bruker må være innlogget for at chatten skal kunne journalføres.

fields.name: Conversation_Error
fields.fieldText: Meldingsloggen er enda ikke lagret. Hvis dialogen fortsatt er pågående må den avsluttes før journalen kan ferdigstilles.

fields.name: Journal_Post_Error_Msg
fields.fieldText: Ooops! Noe har gått galt! En dyktig utvikler har allerede fått beskjed om denne feilen og er snart i gang med å finne ut hva som gikk galt. Han eller hun vil ta kontakt med deg direkte i Teams slik at dere kan løse det sammen og få journalført chatten på riktig måte. Du kan bare lukke denne chatfanen og jobbe videre.

fields.name: Task_Error
fields.fieldText: Ooops! Noe har gått galt! En dyktig utvikler har allerede fått beskjed om denne feilen og er snart i gang med å finne ut hva som gikk galt. Han eller hun vil ta kontakt med deg direkte i Teams slik at dere kan løse det sammen og få opprettet oppgaven på riktig måte. Du kan bare lukke denne chatfanen og jobbe videre.

fields.name: Journal_Header
fields.fieldText: Journal

fields.name: Social_Service_Information
fields.fieldText: Informasjon Sosiale Tjenester
fields.helpText: Huk av denne hvis chatsamtalen inneholder meldinger med informasjon om hvorvidt bruker mottar sosiale tjenester fra NAV.

fields.name: Task_Priority
fields.fieldText: Oppgaveprioritet:

fields.name: Task_due_date
fields.fieldText: Frist:

fields.name: Task_Description
fields.fieldText: Oppgave til NAV-enhet:

fields.name: Entry_Completed_Text
fields.fieldText:
﻿Chatsamtalen er journalført på:

{!Journal_Entry_Text}

variables.description: Output text to display existing journal entries for the chat transcript.
variables.name: Journal_Entry_Text

variables.description: Original document variant for the journal.
variables.name: Journal_Variant_Original

variables.description: NAV Task to be created and delegated.
variables.name: NAV_Task

variables.name: NavTask_Failed
